job.title: Software Engineer
job.description: Multiple opportunities in Huntsville, AL for Software Engineers! See below for a snapshot of what we would be looking for: <br>- High level of proficiency in Python and/or C++<br>- Experience with Linux<br>- Embedded systems experience<br>- Experience using software tools like Jira, Confluence, Git, Bitbucket, etc.<br>- Experience with automated software test development
